name: RODENTWARS!
summary: RODENTWARS! Part 1. The RodentWar has begun. *THIS GAME IS AN EARLY ACCESS LIVE PROTOTYPE AT THE MOMENT* TRY OUT THE RODENT HAMSTERBALL PHYSICS ENGINE! NETWORK WITH FRIENDS IN THE ARENA WORLDZONE! CHAT ON THE STEAM COMMUNITY TO SUGGEST FEATURES! *CURRENTLY PLANNED UPCOMING FEATURES* ARM UP TO VANQUISH ENEMIES FOR CHEESE AND GLORY! CONTEST FOR AND CRAFT DEADLY BATTLE-BALL WEAPONS! DEFEAT ENEMIES TO MERCILESSLY SQUISH THEM TO HAMSTER-JAM! *THIS GAME IS AN EARLY ACCESS LIVE PROTOTYPE AT THE MOMENT*
